topics.body:
"@Princess♠Molestia":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55962b0e63687275e0000cff#post_55962b0e63687275e0000cff
Not to get religious, but personally that's what I think "gods"/"demons"/etc are.  If you exist in a place where there's no time or laws of physics then you don't have to follow the laws of physics.

For all we know "God" could just be some dude that went "hmmm. . . What's this crack in the fabric of reality?  I'll try walking through it!"
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55962bd56368721c2800187c#post_55962bd56368721c2800187c
I'd be fine with that
an absolute being makes it possible that absolute right and absolute wrong exist and I don't like that idea. 

I think of the universe as god's fifth grade science project that's currently sitting in god's closet underneath their gym bag.

"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55962ca06368724adc000a69#post_55962ca06368724adc000a69
[bq="Too_Offensive"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55962bd56368721c2800187c#post_55962bd56368721c2800187c
I'd be fine with that
an absolute being makes it possible that absolute right and absolute wrong exist and I don't like that idea. 

I think of the universe as god's fifth grade science project that's currently sitting in god's closet underneath their gym bag. [/bq]
"Daddy!  Look I made dinosaurs!"
"Good work son!  I'm proud!"
*asteroid hits*
"Aww shit son!  What did I say about taking care of your fifth grade science projects?!"
"Look daddy!  I gave them how to use splitting atoms for energy!"
"No son!  This is worse than the time you shook your goldfish's bag too much!"

topics.body:
"@Princess♠Molestia":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55962def63687275e0001264#post_55962def63687275e0001264
That would actually explain a fuck ton about religions, cause imagine trying to explain concepts like death, disease or loss to beings that don't experience any.

From their point of view "death" could be like a video game game death where you instantly respawn.

"Now team!  Aim for the highest kill-death ratio you can get!"
*notices that they're not respawning*
". . oh. . . ohhhhh shit. . i dun fucked up"



Also what do you guys think of the new avatar?
It's from this:
!http://i3.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/961/556/ea1.jpg!
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
